content.rendered:
We Make Crypto Simple.

Finally a Crypto Trading Platform you can actually understand.
Start buying and selling crypto with CoinSmart!

Get Started

We Make Crypto Simple.

Finally a Crypto Trading Platform you can actually understand.
Start buying and selling crypto with CoinSmart!

Get Started
Designed for Beginners
and Built for Experts.
We have you all covered.

Our mission is to make cryptocurrency accessible to everyone. CoinSmart is the easiest to use cryptocurrency trading platform. Buy and sell bitcoin and other digital currencies quickly and easily on desktop and mobile.

Get Started

Want more than just Bitcoin and Ethereum?

No Problem!

 

Buy and sell Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Cardano, Stellar and more with CoinSmart. We are constantly adding digital currencies to our platform.

Get Started

Advanced crypto trading tools
at your fingertips.

CAD
USD
EURO

BTC/CAD

Bitcoin
$
68,906.29
7.29%

BTC/USD

Bitcoin

54,508.00
7.29%

BTC/EUR

Bitcoin
€
48,584.07
7.29%

Other
Cryptocurrencies

Get verified instantly with CoinSmart.

Create an account and get verified in minutes. Access your funds the same day you make a deposit – no more pairing and tethering needed. Once you get verified you can start buying and selling your digital currencies.

Create An Account
Get Started

Smart Guarantee.
CoinSmart heard you!

You spoke and we heard you! At CoinSmart, we’ve eliminated long wait times for deposits, withdrawals and account verification.

Our SmartGuarantee:

  • All Deposits are in your account the same day we receive them.
  • All Fiat Withdrawals are processed within 5 business days.
  • All accounts are verified the same day (usually instantly!).
Learn More

Ready to start Buying
and Selling cryptocurrencies?

Here are just some of the reasons why customers love CoinSmart.

SmartTrade


Forget about trading pairs!

With one click you can trade from one altcoin to another, without having to trade to Bitcoin or Ethereum first.

Read More
Read More

Industry Leading Security

Have peace of mind that your coins are safe and secure. CoinSmart utilizes the top custody providers on the planet by leveraging the power of Bitgo and Fireblocks. Cold storage? Yep. Safe and secure verifications? You got it. 2FA? Of course.

Be confident with CoinSmart.

Get Started
Get Started

Advanced Trading Tools

Are you a crypto genius?

We have all the bells and whistles of a truly advanced trading platform. Experienced traders can use limit orders, stop loss and real time charting.

Learn More
Learn More

Trust and Accountability

Nothing is more important when buying and selling crypto than trusting your provider.

CoinSmart has all the appropriate licensing and registrations required in each jurisdiction we operate in.

Customers trust CoinSmart.

Create An Account
Create An Account

Made with ❤️  in Canada

We are proud to be built in Canada! Now with our multiple licenses, we’re open for business in new markets!

Where Are We?
Where are we?
SmartSupport

24/7 Live Support.         
That’s our promise.

CoinSmart provides 24/7 omnichannel customer support to help answer all your questions. You can connect with a SmartRep via email, phone call, or live chat. With CoinSmart you’re a person, not a number. Now that’s customer service and why we can boast a 97% customer satisfaction rate.
Talk To Us
Talk To Us

Be smart. Accept Bitcoin
payments and access
your cash instantly with
SmartPay Auto-Sell Wallets.

SmartPay is the easiest way to accept crypto payments. Instantly convert your BTC to fiat with same day payouts wired to your bank account with our auto-sell wallets. Get guaranteed exchange rates and low transaction fees without the risk of chargebacks or price volatility.
Get Started

Want to invoice your customers in crypto?

Smartpay Invoicing does just that. 

Smartpay makes it quick and easy to accept
Crypto. All you need to do is create an account,
invoice your customer and the customer pays
with crypto. SIMPLE! Your crypto is auto-sold
on receipt and funds are wired to your bank
account right away. Want to hold?
Smartpay allows you to do that too.

Learn More

CoinSmart is expanding!

Our roots started growing in Canada and as true Canadians, we’re thrilled to bring our incredible trading platform to more countries.
  • Available
  • Coming Soon

CoinSmart Services

We are more than just a retail Crypto Trading Platform. Check out all we have to offer at CoinSmart.

Smart Trade

Forget about trading pairs. With one click you can trade one altcoin to another, without having to trade to Bitcoin or Ethereum first.

Read More

Smart Trade

Forget about trading pairs. With one click you can trade one altcoin to another, without having to trade to Bitcoin or Ethereum first.

Read More

Advanced Trade

This feature was specifically designed for more experienced investors. Featuring limit orders, stop loss, and real-time charting, you can place customized orders using our order book functionality regardless of your trading volume.

Get Started

Advanced Trade

This feature was specifically designed for more experienced investors. Featuring limit orders, stop loss, and real-time charting, you can place customized orders using our order book functionality regardless of your trading volume.

Get Started

SmartPay Invoicing

Smartpay Invoicing makes it quick and easy to invoice customers and accept Crypto.

Learn More

SmartPay Invoicing

Smartpay Invoicing makes it quick and easy to invoice customers and accept Crypto.

Learn More

SmartPay Auto-Sell Wallets

Is price volatility keeping you from accepting crypto payments? SmartPay Wallets auto-sell your crypto on receipt and funds are wired to your bank account right away.

Learn More

SmartPay Auto-Sell Wallets

Is price volatility keeping you from accepting crypto payments? SmartPay Wallets auto-sell your crypto on receipt and funds are wired to your bank account right away.

Learn More

OTC

Where the true crypto players come to play. CoinSmart’s OTC desk provides everything a professional trader needs. We offer tight spreads and best in class execution for even the largest trades.

Contact Us

OTC

Where the true crypto players come to play. CoinSmart’s OTC desk provides everything a professional trader needs. We offer tight spreads and best in class execution for even the largest trades.

Contact Us

CS Premium

Looking to trade $25,000 or more? Our white glove service will do everything for you. Excellent rates, deep liquidity and same day settlements are just some of the perks of CS Premium.

Learn More

CS Premium

Looking to trade $25,000 or more? Our white glove service will do everything for you. Excellent rates, deep liquidity and same day settlements are just some of the perks of CS Premium.

Learn More

What do our customers say about CoinSmart?

Kyle M

Canada
Read More
Great Customer service and advice. Extremely satisfied with my deposit and the level of customer service I received. Nice to talk to a real person for my questions.
Bernard L.

Toronto, Canada
Read More
I've been dealing with CoinSmart for around 2 years now. All transactions have been smooth and the security seems really well done. Whenever I've had an issue, I have used the online chat and had someone help me within minutes. Really good service!
Chris S.

Canada
Read More
CoinSmart is an easy to use cryptocurrency exchange with a nice user interface and comparable fees. The support team responds very quickly and are helpful in resolving any issues. CoinSmart is on my list of exchanges when I am checking for the best market prices!
Scott C.

Toronto, Canada
Read More
The customer service with this company is second to none. They have gone out of their way to help me with a couple initial questions I had. I am new to the whole Bitcoin thing and I was and still am amazed how much effort was put into helping me. I will be referring this company to anyone and everyone.
Crypto in the palm of your hand. Access your account 24/7.

Download the best crypto trading app today and see how easy it is to buy and sell bitcoin and many other coins through our mobile app.
